column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Seriously one of my favorite spots! I had my birthday here last October (I know
column2: a little late on my review) but I had the best experience of my restaurant eating life! Food was amazing of course but I really have to give it to the entire staff. The hosts were extremely accommodating
column3: so was the manager and owner. They were very involved on making my special day perfect! And to top it all off
column4: our waiter Terry was not only an excellent waiter but the most entertaining waiter I've ever had. I will definitely be coming back! Highly recommended!
